item.title: R to @TheBloggess: After hearing from lots of health care people (thank you!) Hailey's going to isolate from us at least a few days and stay home at least through next week. They're not exactly crushed at having to binge-watch Dance Moms in bed for a week while having food delivered to their door.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess

item.title: R to @TheBloggess: Anyway, wash your hands. Get your boosters. Stay hydrated. Love.

item.title: R to @TheBloggess: Did a telehealth call with a dr who said they don‚Äôt need to quarantine (which *kind of* makes sense bc it‚Äôs been 5 days since their symptoms began) & that they don‚Äôt need to wear a mask around us (CDC says 10 days?) and now I‚Äôm questioning everything.

item.title:
Worst cake pop ever.
After 5 days of feeling mild to moderately sick and multiple negative tests Hailey took one final one just to be sure and‚Ä¶they have fucking Covid. I apologize if the sound of their entirely valid ‚ÄúI TOLD YOU SO‚Äù set off your car alarms.

item.title:
It‚Äôs hard being blue in Texas, but I‚Äôve seen so many Republican friends and family shift left in the last years. Some stopped voting. Some will be voting Democrat this year for the first time ever. Some were convinced by their children or grandchildren.
There‚Äôs hope, y‚Äôall.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess

item.title: Sometimes I write things that I think are funny but that I'm not sure if anyone else in the world will think are funny and usually they stay in drafts but today I'm sharing one because I can't even tell anymore. https://thebloggess.com/2022/06/21/baby-jesus-doesnt-need-your-likes-probably/

item.title: Heres what I want: to be emailed every time there's an election I personally need to vote in, with a breakdown of what I'm supposed to vote for and why, but not get the emails about how we're all about to die if I don't give another $50. Does this exist?
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess

item.title:
You‚Äôre writing‚Ä¶fishing for new ideas. You feel a bite. Is it the muse?
No. It is Hunter S Thomcat under your desk. ‚ÄúBring me catnip, you hack‚Äù he seems to whisper. ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs ditch this 9-5 bullshit and get fucked up.‚Äù
